Package com.business

Class CreditCardDummyServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.business.CreditCardDummyServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CreditCardDummyService
@Component
public class CreditCardDummyServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CreditCardDummyService
Author:
Mario Ruiz Rojo
Bussines layer to manage a list of credit cards It offers operations to manage the credit card list
IMPORTANT: this is not a real world business layer class implementation because it doesn't use any data source (database or external service)
